titles.title: Renewable Energy Production Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009
Renewable Energy Production Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 5-year extension of the credit for electricity produced from certain renewable resources.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Renewable Energy Production Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend for five years the tax credit for producing electricity from certain facilities using renewable resources.
